text: George James Buckley (6 April 1935 14 September 1991) was a Labour Party politician in the United Kingdom. Buckley was Member of Parliament for Hemsworth from 1987, replacing Alec Woodall, until his death in 1991 at the age of 56. ==References== *The Times Guide to the House of Commons, Times Newspapers Ltd, 1987 & 1992 * Category:1935 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:National Union of Mineworkers-sponsored MPs Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:People who died in office
title: George Buckley (British politician)
